column5: A unique one bedroom apartment fully separated and private.  Perfect for a weekend getaway or if you're just in town for a visit. It offers a fully functional kitchen and a full bathroom equipped with jetted tub. Come enjoy the breathtaking views and tranquility of this property. Located on a dead end street it doesn't get quitter than this. Plenty of outdoor space for you and your four legged friends. Amenities include free wifi, pool, outdoor space & grill, secured parking.
